body: @Demavend, you not skip any from start cuz the explanation was in the extra page of the end so she is just a slut ( she maybe a  victim from her friend ) that want to Satisfy her lust so she search a man and fuck him to fullfil her list and change man after that so you can say taht girl just a Hidden Slut School Idol

So for the first story, the girl was a slut that want to drug a man with red Pill and sex with a man till death/coma so good reason for MC to steal His brother GF but unluckily in the end His Now GF was used the drug so His wouldn't cheated from her and he fell as same as His brother?
I can understand with the awful brother... but I don't get why the cucked brother also was fed drugs. Maybe I missed something when I was reading it.
So,both of them die from overdoing sex and drugs?

For the main story 1-122 if you're abhorrent to all NTR, this is not for you, but if you don't mind NTR as long as there is a good story involved trust me it's a great read. if you're interested in it at all read it. 123-142 is a more traditional NTR. The rest of the Tank is non-NTR.

I thought the whole anthology would be filled with NTR,but boy oh boy was I pleasantly wrong.
Awesome work by awesome artist,I really liked both the stories and the art.
